sentences.en: ABB's long history with the TVA dates back to the utility's founding.
sentences.cn: ABB与TVA悠久的合作历史可以追溯到发电厂的建立之时.

sentences.en: Along with Brad Delson, he is a founding member of Linkin Park.
sentences.cn: 和布莱德·道森是哥们.布莱德是林肯公园的另一位创始成员.

sentences.en: H . G . Wells remains one of the founding fathers of science fiction.
sentences.cn: 威尔斯是科幻小说的创始人之一.

sentences.en: He influenced the founding of South Australia as a noncontact settlement.
sentences.cn: 他发挥影响力,让南澳大利亚成为非罪犯定居地.

sentences.en: He is founding director of The Conservation Foundation.
sentences.cn: 他是自然资源保护基金会的创办负责人。

sentences.en: He was fascinated by the Founding Fathers.
sentences.cn: 他特别景仰的是开国元勋.

sentences.en: Joe is a founding partner of DT Capital Partners.
sentences.cn: 田立新先生是德同资本的创始合伙人.

sentences.en: Modern China's founding father, Sun Yat - sen , proposed a dam in 1919.
sentences.cn: 现代中国的奠基人 孙中山 早在1919年就曾设想过建造长江大坝.

sentences.en: The committee held its founding congress in the capital, Riga.
sentences.cn: 委员会在首都里加召开了成立大会。

sentences.en: The founding meeting is made up of the subscribers.
sentences.cn: 创立大会由认股人组成.

sentences.en: The founding of the beginning of Chahar Province is still Yanbei area.
sentences.cn: 建国初,属察哈尔省,仍属雁北区.

sentences.en: The HKSAR is a founding member of the WTO.
sentences.cn: 香港特区是世贸的创始成员.

sentences.en: The promoters shall convene a founding meeting within thirty days.
sentences.cn: 发起人应当在三十日内主持召开公司创立大会.

sentences.en: We commemorate the founding of our nation with a public holiday.
sentences.cn: 我们放假一日以庆祝国庆.

sentences.en: You're that family with the conspiracy theory about the Founding Fathers?
sentences.cn: 你是那个宣扬我们建国先辈阴谋理论的家族?

words.tran_cn: [机]铸造；建造；以…为基础（found的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 建造( found的现在分词)，熔化，建立…的基础，以…为基础
